About Me

Something about me...

BIO

I graduated in December 2019 from SUNY New Paltz. One day my husband told me he got an offer in Iowa, then we packed everything we can and headed to Iowa at the beginning of Feburary. I loving coding. It's a lot of fun. When I finish a program I feel so fulfilled. I just deployed my first project on AWS recently. When I see my website live, I know that's exactly what I want to do in future. I want to create projects and people can use.

Optimized the layout and functions for the web-based dashboard by using HTML, JavaScript and PHP. Implemented forget password module for the software called Data Consulate by using C# and XAML.
